post.text: "If we let Hillary's opponent win this election, then we are sending a clear message to our kids: that everything they're seeing and hearing is perfectly okay. We are validating it. We are endorsing it." —First Lady Michelle Obama

comment.author: Lewis
comment.text: It makes me wonder how silly people are about what is going on. Go with your gut instinct we all know how many lies clintons said and Obama has done nothing in his term people are voting for trump because there is no hope with the other crooks people are struggling
